title: HOOD BULLISH AND BEARISH SCENARIO $$$
name: thekidtrader11
contents: As you can see, since HOOD formed a double top pattern, it has been consistently declining from the second peak. I have marked out the important resistance and support lines for you to get a better idea of where HOOD is headed. If HOOD is able to break the current resistance, it has a chance of retesting the main support again, but it tested the current resistance yesterday and failed to break through, giving us a rough sketch that HOOD might decline further.

title: $XVG Wave III targets: 13 - 48 cents
name: CryptoKaku
contents:
Updated the chart. The more time lapses the more we see the bigger picture more clearly, so we think!

I like how this fits the parallel channel .
If history repeats, we are in Wave III conservative targets are 14-48 cents.

What do you think?

title: BTCUSDT above trendline pump is expected
name: MMBTtrader
contents:
As we can see, resistance of the first trendline broke, but the second trendline resistance is still valid and if the price goes above that resistance, the market can get bullish and hit 26K as the next target.

Red arrows on the chart and the possibility of the dump is still valid and if major support break next targets are then 16.5K$ and 15K$
((press likeüëç if you enjoy + comment your opinion about the market or your thoughts, below this analysis))

name: jaydee_757
contents:
*Important - Once majority bashes crypto and calls it a scam (like how many did in 2018 and missed out), that is when I will be all in!

Whales/elites will not miss any opportunities into making money. They simply buy the fear, hype up the market, take profit and crash it again after taking profit. Instead of beating then, lets ride with them! ;)

Majority got Rekt last year due to listening to the "Bullish" Narratives the media and Social Media Influencers were portraying last year! Stop listening to them and start paying attention to the technicals.

Before reading, get rid of your moonboy mentality and no emotions for dips/corrections! Cannot rule bearish scenarios! Dips are for buying!!

People are so focused on the hourly/ daily timeframe that they get emotional on every dip! Take a step back to the weekly/ monthly timeframe and see why I'm so bullish now. Stop looking at the short-term dips/rise. Short term is irrelevant for the move that is coming!

You can't be emotional in these markets (stocks, forex, crypto, real estate, etc.). You will lose this game following the news and doing what the majority does. News creates emotions. Everything you need to know are on the charts. News is manipulated by the elites, and they take advantage of our emotions. Stop listening to the news and pay more attention to the charts. Don't follow the majority, because the majority will lose in the end! Also, don't buy the hype when everyone is buying.. instead buy the fear when everyone else is selling

Everything is on the chart! Cryptocurrencies are on the verge of exploding higher. Dips/Corrections are normal and needed in a bull market and are buying opportunities! Huge gains opportunity in the coming months! Never trade blindly. Use multiple indicators to make calculated decisions. Trade with no emotions!

Facts:
The Best Opportunity is when the RSI and Stochastic RSI are in between the Orange Box and the Fear and Greed index is at "Extreme Fear"!

"If you can't beat the fear, do it scared!"

"Be fearful when others are greedy, and greedy when others are fearful!" - Warren Buffet.

"Markets are a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient. - Warren Buffet

"Show me the charts, and I'll tell you the news." - Bernard Baruch

"The secret to investing/trading is figuring out how rich you want to be and how poor you're willing to become."

"If you want to live like the 5% of the population who are hugely successful, then don't act like the 95%!"

title: Volatility - The S&P 500 is primed for a massive upside move
name: without_worries
contents:
And everyone is bearish . In fact, everyone is so bearish it is actually bullish . Hedge fund managers, retail investors, you name it all squeezing out the last pennies to purchase more Put contracts. Now at a 20 year record high.

Back in January I published an idea why it was a good time to remain in Cash as the volatility index broke resistance. Latterly there was considerable bearish divergence on the index.


Now the market is about to do a 180. Hard as that is to believe, the charts only deceive those that cannot read (myself included!).

Why am I so bullish?

On the above 2-day chart top to bottom

a) S&P 500 index
b) Volatility index
c) RSI

At this time the volatility index is at resistance. This resistance test occurs when RSI is overbought (red circles). Yes volatility could break through as in March 2020. However that is not important. Look left. The sell off then was short lived and quickly exhausted whilst latterly representing the best buying opportunity of a life time.

There‚Äôs more‚Ä¶

Bullish divergence . The strength of the bearish divergence at the beginning the year is now matched by the bullish divergence currently printing.

On the 5-day chart below multiple oscillators are printing bullish divergence over a 45 day period. The chart has not seen this number of divergence since 2009 and 2002.

Still bearish? Change your bias quickly, this melt up will leave your jaw hitting the floor.

Ww

title: NZD/JPY:SELL From 50% FIBO Dynamic Trendline  SHORT Setup
name: FOREXN1
contents: NZD/JPY in a strong downtrend in the last sessions had a Pullback, this retracement reach the 50% Fibo from the previous Swing where a confluence of the Dynamic trendline, plus the presence of the 50 Moving average can be a great point where place a sell position. The Stochastic is in the overbought scenario and all these clues make our idea strong for a Short position.

title: BTCUSD High Odds in Favor We are Still in Distribution Explained
name: WyckoffMode
contents:
Hi Everyone! Following up with another Video publication to point out we have new candles for the 24-hour, 2-Day, 3-Day, 4-Day and 6-Day; which still look rather bleak in regard to a reversal to the upside. Instead, the indicators in many of the time frames in the Near Term Group suggest we have a chance for Stage 2 Expansion Down. Meaning, a chance for another episode of increased selling pressure volume resulting in B-Bands expanding again; as well as price action going DOWN with this potential upcoming expansion.

Hope this video is helpful...

Happy Trading and Stay Awesome!

David

Comment: UPDATE:

Current 2021/2022 Distribution Period:

BTCUSD Bitstamp Simple Pitchfork with Fib Retracements Pulled Back View:

BTCUSD Bitstamp Simple Pitchfork with Fib Retracements Local Zoomed in View:

BLX Simple Pitchfork Pulled Back View:

BLX Simple Pitchfork Zoomed in View:

2018 Distribution; 2019 to 2021 Accumulation; followed by 2021/2022 Distribution:

Entire History of Bitcoin - Wyckoff Method - No Detailed Events Within Each Phase Described:

Comment: UPDATE:

Near Term Group of time frames:

Comment: UPDATE:

Made an "adjustment" on the "Entire History of Bitcoin..." Chart. I added the purple text bubble for Buying Climax in February 2021 and moved the Red and Yellow local text bubbles over to the right a bit.

Comment: UPDATE:

The Daily (24h) and 2-Day time frames are emphasized in this chart. Keep a look out on BOTH the Red and Blue Lines going below white level 30 in the Daily and 2-Day.

Comment: UPDATE:

BTCUSD Near Term Group of time frames:

Comment: UPDATE:

1-Month Time Frame:

BLUE TEXT BUBBLE:

Red Line is already below White Level 30. The Blue Line is currently at Level 32.1.
This could spell bad news for another leg down. Meaning, we have high odds of
seeing a "Sign of Weakness" in Phase E event soon.

In history, the Green Line rising up and/or the Yellow K-Line rising above level 10
would manage to save the day. We could go to lower time frames than the this
1-Month time frame to see what was responsible for the Yellow K-Line rising above
level 10 in the 1-Month during those periods in history. We are currently watching
lower time frames than the 1-Month. Example: I've pointed out the Weekly tme
frame several times in the past couple of video publications. The Red and Blue Lines
in the Weekly are BOTH below white level 30 at this writing.

This time may be different than historical behavior. We are actually seeing the market
go DOWN "with" EXPANSION of the B-Bands in the 1-Month for the very first time.
Historically, this has been opposite in the 1-Month. You can see the B-Bands were
CONTRACTING while the market was going down when looking at historical price and
B-Band behavior.

We have a new 1-Month candle in 9-Days. Brace yourself... It's going to get volatile.

Comment: UPDATE:

The last sentence of me last post stated the following: "We have a new 1-Month candle in 9-Days. Brace yourself... It's going to get volatile."

As you can see in the 6-hour; it has been volatile with a lot of UP and DOWN price movement in the 6-hour time frame. The trend has still been downward... Not upward...

If you are wondering where the MAGENTA DIAGONAL TREND LINE is coming from in the 6-hour time frame; I'm providing a "pulled back view" of the 6-hour (without b-bands) to show you.

Comment: UPDATE:

NEW Trend Lines created for 6-hour time frame. Here is a Pulled Back View:

A little closer view of the Trend Lines in the 6-hour:

A more zoomed in view of Trend Lines in 6-hour time frame:

Zoomed in a bit more:

Comment: UPDATE:

12-hour time frame:

BLUE TEXT BUBBLE:
Now we have a problem with the Blue LSMA in the 12-hour
being very low. Watch out the next 12-hour candle. The
Red Line may join the Blue Line the next 12-hour candle
by them both being below white level 30. Doing so would
increase the odds for price action to go further to the
downside with Stage 2 Expansion Down.

RED TEXT BUBBLE:
Red Line might fall below white level 30 the next 12-hour candle.

Comment: UPDATE:

Simply cleaned up this chart a bit and added vertical lines for each phase of present day distribution period. This chart is simply a reference for those involved and/'or interested in Wyckoff Method.

Comment: UPDATE:

Made Correction: Changed "LPS" to "BU/LPS" event in Phase D for November/December, 2020 Accumulation:

Comment: UPDATE:

Simply posting present day Distribution Schematic for future reference:

title: @Hex correction
name: aZimou
contents:
I'm expecting hex to go to 0.03 at least, maybe more.
But in My opinion it will be the last big down before a nice bull rallye .

0.025 cents is the lowest price for me.


0.045 and 0.040 are the first zones where I am DCA.

Comment: We hit the 0.027 GRetat !

Now Things still very Bearish At the moment. SO, I'm expecting a retracement to 0.038 -> 0.045. And after that if the dollar continues to go Up I'm expecting A drop to 0.02 ->0.015.

IMO Those are going to be the lowest Zones.

I hope a consolidation in the lowest zones before the run up .



We are going to wait a couple of years to See great profits.

title: TRX Year-Long Triangle Concluding (Elliott Wave/Neowave)
name: Intuit
contents:
TRX has been trading in a relatively tight range since last year, that range is coming to a point now and it seems like, based on EW structure, that this triangle should break up within the next few weeks. If it doesn't break up in the next few weeks then we'll probably see it continue to consolidate into the tip of the triangle until the end of the year, before breaking up.

If this is the end of a pattern which began in 2018, as shown on my chart, we should see a explosive and near vertical move out of this range. Typically, when volatility reaches a very low point, it is often followed by a massive increase in volatility . This combined with USDD potentially burning a huge amount of the supply of TRX in the future could lead to prices in the double or even triple digits over the next year.

Comment:

Triangle to end a triangle?

title: $U good opening w/ volume and stochastic buy sign
name: OptionsRising
contents:
First on this 30min chart please note the white arrow marking a bullish %K stochastic sign. When %K moves from below 20 to above 80 in 2-3 candles (using custom period settings), it gives a high probability sign that more upside is coming. Often a pullback happens first, and thus far the opening move has reversed down but on lighter volume . There may be a retest of Friday's lows or a move lower and then a strong move higher.

This reversal after the %K sign offers a low risk entry for call options, and options prices are also cheaper since price has flipped down.

The green lines on RSI and stochastic show bullish divergence with price (red line). The dashed green line is a daily support line that broke to retest lows. I am looking for price to move back over this line within two days. Volume shelf price targets are provided on the right.

Comment: It has been stuck under 34.30. This morning stochastic %K gave a buy notice with its rise from under 20 to over 80 in 3 candles. Indicators are looking more bullish and if markets continue higher then U should break high of day and quickly rise through volume gap to 34.80-35.10. If demand is strong then it will rise to 36, top end of chop zone (seen on 30m chart).

title: BTC/USDT: Neutral between 19400 and 24900 (Caution)
name: JeanJean1983
contents:
--- Mid-term Analysis for the next coming 4 weeks to 3 months - Based on Daily Chart -------

BTC/USDT: Neutral between 19400 and 24900 (Caution)

Context
- The Global Crypto market leads by BTC and ETH reversed a new bullish trend this summer - however the market is now challenging the capacity to go higher, 24900 never been reintegrated
- The global macro remains bearish (Crypto + Stocks market) leads by hawkish ton from central bank and a further inflation risk context
- BTC could outperform ETH in order to let ETH be aligned in term of price with ETH

Previous Analysis 09/09/2022 :


Market configuration

- Graphical Elements :

Graphical Resistance = 24900 & 28800
Graphical Support = 19400

- Mathematical Indicators:
EMA ( Exp Moving averages) are resistances at 24900 = Bearish
RSI indicator (below) is below 5% with no divergence = Bearish

- Elliot & Harmonic Wave (Fibonacci):
A last drop to draw the wave 5 C (4) has been completed - however 24900 never been surpassed
Fibonacci resistance of the wave (3) = 28800
Fibonacci support of the wave (2) is 19400
Fibonacci upside target = 32600
Fibonacci downside target = 16100 / 14600 / 12400

Conclusion

Combining the fondamental situation (Global macro fighting against inflation with hawkish ton from FED) + Technical Elements , it now hard to find element to call for a further recovery, it is better to protect the gains from the summer and wait for clearer situation

Neutral : We turn Neutral between 19400 and 24900, a break below 19400 would validate a further downside towards 16100 first max 14100 for the moment - Only a strong short-squeeze reintegrating 24900 would jeopardize the bear market.
Trade active: 19400 broken confirming free fall to 16100
Trade closed: target reached: New update available
